comment.author: 13706945@N00
comment._content: Information from the CWGC database: BARNARD, WALTER Rank: Private Service No: 14499 Date of Death: 03/05/1917 Age: 27 Regiment/Service: Leicestershire Regiment, 9th Bn. Memorial: Arras Memorial Panel Reference: Bay 5. Additional Information: Son of John and Mary Barnard, of Middle St., Elton, Peterborough. www.cwgc.org/find-war-dead/casualty/739888/BARNARD,%20WALTER

comment.author: 13706945@N00
comment._content: His name is recorded on the War Memorial in St Peter's Church, Knossington, Leicestershire: www.theygavetheirtoday.com/knossington.html There, it says that Barnard enlisted in Oakham and was killed in action during the third Battle of the Scarpe.
